title: Carney rides Canadian fury at Trump to victory
shortDescription: Mark Carney won the Canadian election to retain power as prime minister.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's 100-day grade
shortDescription: New poll shows a majority of Americans disapprove of Trump's job so far. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Trump admin probes Harvard and its law review for 'race-based discrimination'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration said it was probing whether Harvard University and the Harvard Law Review violated civil rights laws.

title: What to know as Congress starts writing sweeping Trump priorities bill
shortDescription: Expect tricky political battles ahead over the massive tax and spending bill.

title: Elon Musk takes a backseat as Donald Trump reaches 100 days
shortDescription: Elon Musk burst into Trump's White House as the chainsaw-wielding government slasher. But 100 days into Trump's term, his role is diminishing.

title: 'Trump is trying to break us': Carney wins in Canada on anti-Trump rage
shortDescription: Mark Carney rode an unprecedented surge of Canadian nationalism sparked by President Donald Trump's aggression and tariffs to victory.

title: 'Deepfake' bill passes Congress, heads to Trump's desk
shortDescription: The Take It Down Act has been a top priority for First Lady Melania Trump. President Trump is expected to sign the bill into law.

title: Trump's policies at the border in photos
shortDescription: See the impact of President Donald Trump's border policies in the first 100 days.

title: 'Wholesale revision': GOP reveals plan for big student loan changes
shortDescription: Congressional Republicans on Monday proposed to reduce eligibility for Pell Grants and impose new rules on student loan programs.

title: President Trump takes jab at Taylor Swift: 'How did that work out?'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump took a jab at mega pop star Taylor Swift as he hosted the Philadelphia Eagles at the White House to honor the LIX champions.

title: President Trump's feud with Canada
shortDescription: Canadians have taken exception with President Trump's talk of tariffs and annexation as the "Elbows Up" movement forms to fight back.

title: Trump open to Abrego Garcia return | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A Milwaukee judge has been charged with federal felonies in an ICE case. | Pope Francis will be laid to rest Saturday.

title: White House displays posters of immigrant arrests
shortDescription: "Mugshot" posters of immigrants the Trump administration accused of crimes were placed along the White House driveway.

title: What's happened at Trump's border?

title: Candidates in Canada election make final pitches
shortDescription: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney and his Conservative rival Pierre Poilievre both made their final pitches to voters on Sunday.

title: Trump to The Atlantic: 'I run the country and the world'
shortDescription: President Trump said he's having more fun the second time around and again teased an unconstitutional third term in an interview with The Atlantic.

title: Biden bemoans 'politics of dehumanization' while praising Pope Francis
shortDescription: Joe Biden praises the late pontiff's humanity and for helping migrants, but also handed out light jabs at Donald Trump, in exclusive USA TODAY op-ed.

title: Trump wants to bring back Columbus Day. But did it ever leave?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he is bringing Columbus Day "back," but did it ever leave? What to know about the federal holiday.

title: Majority disapprove of Trump's job as president in latest NBC poll
shortDescription: A majority of 55% of survey respondents said they disapprove of President Donald Trump's first 100 days in office, while 45% said they approve.
